originalText.text: Dr. Linkov is phenomenal with his great team. I had great experience with his team helping me touching up my age related hair receding. The result is amazing and discreet. I was able to go to work by the end of  weekend and nobody in my office would know that I even had hair transplant procedure. 6 months in and the area has filled up. I really appreciate his expertise and his team's dedication.

originalText.text: Had my surgery almost a year ago and have been in love with every step of the way. The only reason I haven’t written a review sooner is because I’m not the type of person to write reviews - I felt Dr. Linkov deserved this though. He’s incredibly humble, knowledgeable, and skilled. He and his staff made sure I was comfortable the entire appointment. Would absolutely recommend.

text.text: Had my surgery almost a year ago and have been in love with every step of the way. The only reason I haven’t written a review sooner is because I’m not the type of person to write reviews - I felt Dr. Linkov deserved this though. He’s incredibly humble, knowledgeable, and skilled. He and his staff made sure I was comfortable the entire appointment. Would absolutely recommend.

originalText.text:
I couldn’t have asked for a better experience with this physician, his staff and practice operations.  As a physician, I have high expectations from my peers.  Dr Linkov, by far, exceeded these expectations.  From my initial consultation (virtual, which was a great plus for me), to correspondence and emails with his staff, to my actual procedure day, I had only positive experiences.  I chose his practice based upon a number of variables.  If you don’t know him or
his practice, you must check him out on YouTube and be sure to follow him on Instagram.  In addition to being a warm and gentle person, he is a true artist.  I had a rather extensive hair transplant performed.  The artistry shown in designing the hairline and completing the procedure was beyond great!  Every aspect of the procedure and follow-up was A+.  If you’re looking for a caring and skilled surgeon, who works with an equally talented team, look no further.  You must afford yourself the benefit of his services.  I couldn’t be happier!  Thanks Dr, Gary!!

originalText.text: I just wanted my lips to look better and Dr. Linkov suggested a corner lip lift. He did a wonderful job making my lips look fuller on the sides and more balanced. He didn't go overboard. He is very caring and empathetic and wants people to leave feeling their best. His nurse, Gloria, is wonderful as well and it’s always nice to see her kind, welcoming face when you first come into the office. Thank you.

originalText.text: I am 9 months status post FUE with Dr. Linkov. I cannot overemphasize how happy I am with the results. Above and beyond my expectations! My hair looks great, the hairline is so well done and natural looking, the density is just right... and I very frequently get compliments! If you are looking for hair restoration and you are considering Dr. Linkov's team, do not hesitate. Dr. Linkov and his team are AMAZING!!!
